sentences.en: A barn adjoins the farmhouse.
sentences.cn: 一座谷仓紧靠着农舍。

sentences.en: a hay barn
sentences.cn: 干草棚

sentences.en: Don't worry — he'll be all safe and snug in the barn.
sentences.cn: 别担心,他呆在粮仓里会平平安安舒舒服服的.

sentences.en: He and Walker patched the barn roof.
sentences.cn: 他和沃克补好了谷仓顶。

sentences.en: He is going to top the barn tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 他打算明天给粮仓封顶.

sentences.en: He left the blankets next to the barn door and waited for Duck to come with typewriter.
sentences.cn: 他立刻在谷仓门外留下了电热毯，然后就等着鸭子带回那台打印机。

sentences.en: He strode purposefully towards the barn.
sentences.cn: 他毅然大步朝粮仓走去。

sentences.en: In 1979, Liquor Barn thrived as a discount merchandiser.
sentences.cn: 1979年，LiquorBarn烈酒折扣店的生意十分红火。

sentences.en: Nicholas has bought a barn in Provence and is spending August doing it up.
sentences.cn: 尼古拉斯在普罗旺斯买了一座条件简陋的大房子，8月份正在装修。

sentences.en: That big building is a barn for keeping the grain.
sentences.cn: 那幢大房子是存放粮食的谷仓.

sentences.en: The barn was filled with the sour-sweet smell of fresh dung.
sentences.cn: 谷仓里弥漫着新粪酸甜的气味。

sentences.en: The barn was heaped with grain.
sentences.cn: 谷仓里堆满了粮食.

sentences.en: The cows were driven into the barn.
sentences.cn: 牛被赶进了牲口棚.

sentences.en: The dilapidated barn detracts charm from the landscape.
sentences.cn: 圮废失修的谷仓有损景色的美。

sentences.en: The grain is liable to mildew when the humidity in the barn is too high.
sentences.cn: 仓库里潮气太大， 粮食就容易发霉。

sentences.en: The next morning I started trapping around the barn .
sentences.cn: 第二天早晨，我就开始在谷仓附近下套子。

sentences.en: The rickety barn needs repairing.
sentences.cn: 这个东倒西歪的粮仓该修理了.

sentences.en: The rooster chased me across the dirt floor of the barn.
sentences.cn: 公鸡追着我跑过谷仓的泥土地面。

sentences.en: They heaped the barn with grain.
sentences.cn: 他们在谷仓里堆满了粮食.

sentences.en: They live in a converted barn (= a barn that has been turned into a house) .
sentences.cn: 他们住在由谷仓改成的房子里。

sentences.en: We have to alter the house into a barn.
sentences.cn: 我们不得不把房子改建成谷仓.
